verses.verse: And you<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, take<WH3947> a sharp<WH2299> knife<WH2719>, take<WH3947> a barber<WH1532>'s razor<WH8593>, and cause it to pass<WH5674> upon your head<WH7218> and upon your beard<WH2206>: then take<WH3947> balances<WH3976> to weigh<WH4948>, and divide the hair<WH2505>.

You shall burn<WH1197> with fire<WH217> a third part<WH7992> in the midst<WH8432> of the city<WH5892>, when the days<WH3117> of the siege<WH4692> are fulfilled<WH4390>: and you shall take<WH3947> a third part<WH7992>, and strike<WH5221> about<WH5439> it with a knife<WH2719>: and a third part<WH7992> you shall scatter<WH2219> in the wind<WH7307>; and I will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after them<WH310>.
You shall also take<WH3947> there a few<WH4592> in number<WH4557>, and bind<WH6696> them in your skirts<WH3671>.

Then take of them again<WH3947>, and cast<WH7993> them into the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, and burn<WH8313> them in the fire<WH784>; for there shall a fire<WH784> come forth<WH3318> into all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; This is Jerusalem<WH3389>: I have set<WH7760> it in the midst<WH8432> of the nations<WH1471> and countries<WH776> that are round about her<WH5439>.

And she has changed<WH4784> my judgments<WH4941> into wickedness<WH7564> more than the nations<WH1471>, and my statutes<WH2708> more than the countries<WH776> that are round about<WH5439> her<WH3988>: for they have refused my judgments<WH4941> and my statutes<WH2708>, they have not walked in them<WH1980>.

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Because you multiplied<WH1995> more than the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you<WH1980>, and have not walked in my statutes<WH2708>, neither have kept<WH6213> my judgments<WH4941>, neither have done<WH6213> according to the judgments<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> that are round about you<WH5439>;

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH6213>, I, even I, am against you, and will execute judgments<WH4941> in the midst<WH8432> of you in the sight<WH5869> of the nations<WH1471>.
And I will do<WH6213> in you that which I have not done<WH6213>, and unto what I will not do<WH6213> any more the like<WH3282>, because of all your abominations<WH8441>.

Therefore the fathers<WH1> shall eat<WH398> the sons<WH1121> in the midst<WH8432> of you<WH1121>, and the sons shall eat<WH398> their fathers<WH1>; and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in you<WH7611>, and the whole remnant of you will I scatter<WH2219> into all the winds<WH7307>.

Therefore<WH2416>, as I live, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Surely<WH2930>, because you have defiled my sanctuary<WH4720> with all your detestable things<WH8251>, and with all your abominations<WH8441>, therefore will I also diminish<WH1639> you<WH5869>; neither shall my eye spare<WH2347>, neither will I have any pity<WH2550>.

A third part<WH7992> of you shall die<WH4191> with the pestilence<WH1698>, and with famine<WH7458> shall they be consumed<WH3615> in the midst<WH8432> of you<WH7992>: and a third part shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> round about<WH5439> you<WH2219>; and I will scatter a third part<WH7992> into all the winds<WH7307>, and I will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after them<WH310>.

Thus shall my anger<WH639> be accomplished<WH3615>, and I will cause my fury<WH2534> to rest<WH5117> upon them<WH5162>, and I will be comforted: and they shall know<WH3045> that I the Lord<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it in my zeal<WH7068>, when I have accomplished<WH3615> my fury in them<WH2534>.
Moreover I will make<WH5414> you waste<WH2723>, and a reproach<WH2781> among the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you<WH5869>, in the sight of all that pass by<WH5674>.

So it shall be a reproach<WH2781> and a taunt<WH1422>, a instruction<WH4148> and a astonishment<WH4923> unto the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you<WH6213>, when I shall execute judgments<WH8201> in you in anger<WH639> and in fury<WH2534> and in furious<WH2534> rebukes<WH8433>. I the Lord<WH3068> have spoken it<WH1696>.

When I shall send<WH7971> upon them the evil<WH7451> arrows<WH2671> of famine<WH7458>, which shall be for their destruction<WH4889>, and which I will send<WH7971> to destroy<WH7843> you<WH3254>: and I will increase the famine<WH7458> upon you<WH7665>, and will break your staff<WH4294> of bread<WH3899>:

So will I send<WH7971> upon you famine<WH7458> and evil<WH7451> animals<WH2416>, and they shall bereave<WH7921> you<WH1698>; and pestilence and blood<WH1818> shall pass through<WH5674> you<WH935>; and I will bring the sword<WH2719> upon you<WH3068>. I the Lord have spoken it<WH1696>.
